name: Goat Adventures 2D
description: Goat Adventures is a 2D platformer where you get to become a goat and you have to complete levels by jumping and moving from platform to platform avoiding any enemies that might get in the way.  Watch out for bears, birds shooting laser beams, and plants spiting fireballs. See if you can find the door to unlock the next level. Master your skills and see if you can beat all the levels in the game.
